flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: This guide will explain how to construct a cannon, using readily available parts and a few custom components.
guide.introduction_rendered: This guide will explain how to construct a cannon, using readily available parts and a few custom components.
guide.summary: Driven by a garage door motor, this water cannon shoots about a liter of water over 100 feet to drench unsuspecting pedestrians.
guide.title: Long Distance Water Cannon
